dct_title_s: World deepwater : oil and gas activity and concession map 2021 / Clarkson Research Services Limited.
dct_description_sm: Includes graphs and charts showing timescale and production statistics. Includes legend. Includes inset maps with indexes: : "Canada - Newfoundland", "Trinidad - NE Venezuela", "Colombia", "Mexico", "Falklands", "Brazil - Aracaju", "Brazil - Espirito Santo", "Brazil - Campos", "Brazil - Santos", "French Guiana - Suriname - Guyana", "USA - Gulf of Mexico", "Atlantic Ocean", "Norway", "Spain - Mediterranean", "Caspian", "Sicily Channel", "Southern Adriatic", "Ivory Coast - Ghana", "Mauritania - Senegal", "East Africa", "West Africa", "Angola - Congo", "Sierra Leone - Liberia", "Mediterranean", "Black Sea", "Myanmar", "China", "Indonesia - Sumatra", "India - Krishna basin", "Philippines", "Malaysia - Brunei", "Indonesia - Kalimantan", "Australia - Timor Sea", "Australia - NW shelf". Includes color advertisements
